thread.title: Wyatt (a/k/a The Jukebox Junkie)
thread.title_full: OLDIES.com reviewed by Wyatt (a/k/a The Jukebox Junkie)

author: Wyatt (a/k/a The Jukebox Junkie)
title: Wyatt (a/k/a The Jukebox Junkie)
text: I have several jukeboxes and like to rotate records in and out. Oldies.com offers a decent selection of 45rpm records, many at a very reasonable price. My order was packaged well and shipped quickly. I have been using this service for several years and they do have good customer service. Thank You!!!
